name: A Mystical Perspective
description:
This game was made for the HPU game jam. The theme is based around a mystical forest that is made up of mushrooms. The forest takes you on an adventure that allows you to make your own decisions that determine the outcome of the story. It is a story based game, that happens to deal with a lot of examples that humans go through on a daily basis. It is a simple game that was made using Twine. 

Artwork and Graphic Design: Nicholas Bloom

Story Creation and Design: Trey Kivett
